about_the_game:
Fill your maze-like factories and ancient hi-tech ruins with fitting music thanks to the Futuristic Dungeon BGM Pack! Ayato sound create is back with another music pack, this time with 11 synth and electronic tunes to give any game a sci-fi flair. Each track comes in M4a and looping Ogg file formats, so you can add them right into your MV/MZ project and not worry about awkward pauses in the music. Add some electronic tunes and metallic beats to your magitech world with the Futuristic Dungeon BGM Pack!

Contents:

* 11 BGM royalty free
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
